title: Quick cinnamon rolls
ingredients: ['180ml milk', '55g butter or margarine', '400g plain flour, divided', '7g quick yeast', '50g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '60ml water', '1 egg', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '1 tablespoon ground cinnamon', '110g butter or margarine, softened', '80g sultanas or raisins (optional)']
